SELECT ci.collect_id, ci.collect_type, ci.business_id, ci.collect_time, ti.topic_id, ti.topic_title, ti.topic_content, ti.topic_time, ti.topic_img, ti.user_id, ti.topic_hot, ti.collect_num, ti.like_num, su.user_name, su.user_avatar, IF( ci1.collect_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0 ) AS is_collect, IF( li.like_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0 ) AS is_like, IFNULL( cif.comment_num, 0 ) AS comment_num FROM collect_info ci LEFT JOIN topic_info ti ON ci.business_id = ti.topic_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT collect_id, business_id FROM collect_info WHERE user_id = #{qry.userId} AND delete_flag = 0 ) ci1 ON ci1.business_id = ti.topic_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT like_id, business_id FROM like_info WHERE user_id = #{qry.userId} AND delete_flag = 0 ) li ON li.business_id = ti.topic_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT topic_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_num FROM comment_info WHERE delete_flag = 0 GROUP BY topic_id) cif ON cif.topic_id = ti.topic_id LEFT JOIN user su ON ti.user_id = su.user_id WHERE ci.collect_type = 1 AND ci.delete_flag = 0 AND ci.user_id = #{qry.user} AND ti.delete_flag = 0
AND (ti.topic_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qry.keyWord},'%') OR ti.topic_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qry.keyWord},'%'))

SELECT ci.collect_id, ci.collect_type, ci.business_id, ci.collect_time, ii.introduction_id, ii.introduction_name, ii.introduction_img, ii.introduction_time, ii.user_id, ii.introduction_desc, ii.introduction_like, ii.introduction_collect, su.user_name, su.user_avatar, IF( ci1.collect_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0 ) AS is_collect, IF( li.like_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0 ) AS is_like FROM collect_info ci LEFT JOIN introduction_info ii ON ci.business_id = ii.introduction_id LEFT JOIN user su ON ii.user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT collect_id, business_id FROM collect_info WHERE user_id = #{qry.userId} AND delete_flag = 0 ) ci1 ON ci1.business_id = ii.introduction_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT like_id, business_id FROM like_info WHERE user_id = #{qry.userId} AND delete_flag = 0 ) li ON li.business_id = ii.introduction_id WHERE ci.collect_type = 2 AND ci.delete_flag = 0 AND ci.user_id = #{qry.user} AND ii.delete_flag = 0
AND (ii.introduction_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qry.keyWord},'%') OR ii.introduction_desc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qry.keyWord},'%'))
